Pre-Game Insights: Pace sensation Mayank Yadav is expected to showcase his raw speed in the series.
Fringe players like Harshit Rana and Nitish Kumar could make their India debut.
The series provides an opportunity for fringe players to build their credentials.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series will also provide clarity for IPL franchises on retention ahead of the mega auction.
Bangladesh will be without Shakib Al Hasan, leaving a significant void in the team.
Others: The match is the international debut for Shrimant Madhavrao Scindia Stadium in Gwalior.
The squads for both teams have been listed, with several fringe players getting opportunities.
